column1: Appendix table 20: Number of state and federal prisoners in private facilities, by jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2008, and 2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Appendix table 20. Number of state and federal prisoners in private facilities, by jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2008, and 2009

column3: Number of prisoners in private facilities

column1: ~Not applicable. As of December 31, 2001, responsibility for sentenced felons from the District of Columbia was transferred to the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
a/Includes federal prisoners held in non-secure, privately operated facilities (8,769 at midyear 2009; numbers from other years can be found in earlier publications).
b/Includes prisoners held in out-of-state private facilities.
